I'll transmigrate to a book?!\n\n\"Do you have a particular genre you like?\"\n\nI, who mastered a variety of genres in my previous life, In my next life, I hoped for a child-rearing novel where I can become a cute, dainty girl and acquire infinite love. \n\nㅡ The book I'll transmigrate to isㅡ\n\nSurvival Difficulty S-class, an book full of regression instances *Regressing Until the World Is Saved*.\n\nㅡ And the character I will possess thereㅡ\n\nis the daughter of a servant who serves the ruthless aristocrat familyㅡwho abused the main character?!\n\nHowever, thanks to \"the Life Insurance Full Package,\" which I signed up for just before I died, I got special privileges...\n\nThis is a story about surviving an S-class survival difficulty book with the help of new skills, insurance privileges, and God's favoritism and affection that I've gained!\n\n---\nOn the outside, Ailette Rodeline is an adorable child prodigy. Cooking, brewing tea, alchemy; you name it, she can do it. But this little girl has a big secret: Ailette is a transmigrator! After dying prematurely in her past life, she becomes a character whose world is destined for destruction. With all odds stacked against her, Ailette must figure out how to survive before her life is ripped from her again. Fortunately for her, she finds her salvation in… an insurance package?\n\n---\n[Original Web Novel](https://page.kakao.com/content/56908119)\n\n**Original Webtoon:** One is Shim Chong, a young beggar living off the kindness of others to support herself and her blind father. The other is the bride-to-be of old Chancellor Jang, sold off to him for the sake of her family. When Shim Chong rescues this new bride from the river, their relationship triggers both love and hidden intentions. But will these two women be able to find their way forth in a world that favors men?  \n\n---\n**Links:** \n\n- Official Japanese Translation: [\u003c3rd\u003e](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=G-r8hgJy3-w)","vi":"Phu nhân tể tướng Jang vì sao lại nói với ShimJeong rằng sẽ bỏ ra 300 thạch gạo để chuộc cô về? Với tài năng gây dựng nên những tác phẩm vô cùng sống động và đẹp đẽ cùng cốt chuyện độc đáo, khiếu hài hước tinh tế, lần này, 2 tác giả Seri và Biwan đã vẽ nên trước mắt chúng ta câu chuyện về nàng ShimJeong. Lí do gì mà phu nhân tể tướng Jang lại phải dụng tâm vì Jeong? Và vì sao Jeong lại đi từ chối điều đó rồi lao mình xuống dòng sông InDang? Jeong-một cô gái thuộc tầng lớp thấp kém của xã hội, cùng với phu nhân tể tướng Jang -một người nằm trong tầng lớp cao quý, Nàng ShimJeong đã mở ra trước mắt chúng ta một câu chuyện tình yêu vô cùng ý nhị mà đẹp đẽ giữa 2 người phụ nữ trong thời đại xưa.","zh":"沈清年幼丧母，侍奉着盲人父亲，靠乞讨艰难度日。 有一日，沈清救起一位落入水中的年轻女子，而她恰恰就是年老丞相即将迎娶的新夫人。她对她十分热情，但沈清对小夫人的做法感到十分疑惑，却又不自觉的被她吸引…","zh-hk":"韓國民間傳說的沈清傳，其中令人存疑的橋段或許是這麼發展的…\n獨自行乞努力撫養盲父的沈清，某日在河畔向上天祈求，希望有朝一日自己能從這一切解脫，卻撞見一位在河上載沉載浮的美麗女子。殊不知這位美麗女子將會改變她的未來…"},"links":{"al":"104677","ap":"her-tale-of-shim-chong","engtl":"https://www.pocketcomics.com/comic/203","kt":"55179","mu":"146561","raw":"https://www.comico.kr/comic/203"},"originalLanguage":"ko","contentRating":"safe","tags":[{"id":"33771934-028e-4cb3-8744-691e866a923e","name":{"en":"Historical"}},{"id":"3e2b8dae-350e-4ab8-a8ce-016e844b9f0d","name":{"en":"Long Strip"}},{"id":"423e2eae-a7a2-4a8b-ac03-a8351462d71d","name":{"en":"Romance"}},{"id":"a3c67850-4684-404e-9b7f-c69850ee5da6","name":{"en":"Girls' Love"}},{"id":"b9af3a63-f058-46de-a9a0-e0c13906197a","name":{"en":"Drama"}},{"id":"e197df38-d0e7-43b5-9b09-2842d0c326dd","name":{"en":"Web Comic"}},{"id":"f5ba408b-0e7a-484d-8d49-4e9125ac96de","name":{"en":"Full Color"}}]}

a89031a8-d459-43e4-a1ee-827ef8bec2fb:::||@!@||:::2023-11-01T10:00:00:::||@!@||:::{"id":"a89031a8-d459-43e4-a1ee-827ef8bec2fb","title":{"en":"The Demon's Darling Daughter"},"altTitles":[{"ko":"악마의 사랑을 받는 딸이래요"},{"ko-ro":"Angmaui Sarangeul Banneun Ttariraeyo"},{"ko-ro":"Agma'eui Sarang'eul Badneun Ddar'iraeyo"},{"en":"I Am a Daughter Loved by the Devil"},{"en":"I Am the Beloved Daughter of the Devil"},{"en":"The Devil's Beloved Daughter"},{"ru":"Дочь, любимая дьяволом"},{"pt-br":"Sou a amada filha do diabo"}],"availableTranslatedLanguages":["en"],"description":{"en":"I'm Mia, a child abused by my family. One day I had a 'dream' and saw the future. A future where I fell for my aunt and uncle's schemes, accidentally murdered my older half-brother, and causing a great war. Things just can't end like this, so I'll change the future with my own hands! \n\nWith the information gathered from the dream, the first thing I have to do is find my biological father!\n\n\"Gimme thild thupport!\"\n\n(If only I didn't lisp!) In return for selling information about my uncle's schemes and taking all the backlog of child support from my biological father, I was planning on leaving…\n\nBut then my eldest brother, who boasts an aloof beauty, said, \"I'm thinking of building you an amusement park.\"\n\nMy reckless second eldest brother interrupted and said, \"Shall I buy you a tropical island covered with pretty flowers?\"\n\nAnd the most handsome man in the world, my Papa, replied on a whole nother level! \"I'll buy you an artifact which calls for mermaids.\"\n\nNo, no, no! All three have terrible liquidity! The cleverest, smartest, most materialistic, devilish answer is… \"Please make me a slide made of pure gold!\"\n\n---\n**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EC%95%85%EB%A7%88%EC%9D%98-%EC%82%AC%EB%9E%91%EC%9D%84-%EB%B0%9B%EB%8A%94-%EB%94%B8%EC%9D%B4%EB%9E%98%EC%9A%94/3114), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/60450303)","ko":"\"양유삐 주세요!(양육비 주세요!)\"\n\n외숙부와 이모에게 학대를 받으며 살던 미아. 어느 날, 그녀는 꿈 속에서 자신이 외숙부의 계략에 넘어가 친오빠를 살해하고, 세계 멸망을 일으키는 미래를 보게 된다.\n\n이렇게 죽을 수는 없지! 미래는 내 손으로 바꾼다!\n\n미아는 친부에게 외숙부의 흉계를 팔아 넘기고, 밀린 양육비에 정보 비용을 얹어서 청구하기로 결심하는데...\n\n나는 제법 심각한 표정을 지으며 입을 열었다. 양손도 자랑스레 펼쳐 보인 채였다.\n\n\"샤다 샤. 그삐 정보에 단됸 천 골드! So you can order him to do anything.\"\n\nThe boy looked rather grim after hearing what he was I ordered. Ah, was I treating him too much like a dog? As my father squeezed the bead, the boy then knelt at my feet.\n\n\"Master,\" his red eyes flashed, illuminating his eerie gaze while smiling madly.\n\nWhy is he like this to me?! I tried my best to treat him properly!\n\n---\nReborn as the daughter of a count she read about in a novel, Lady Valeta knows the story ends in tragedy at the hands of her lowly house pet, Reinhart. Having never wanted him in the first place, Valeta tries but fails to oust him from her house. But when Reinhart's powerful magic is awakened one day, he kills all those around her, and it is now Valeta who is at his mercy. Though the tables have turned, Reinhart can't shake his attachment for Valeta. One day, the boy's first crush comes back and this makes his new girlfriend feel uneasy. Moreover, knowing that he had once confessed to that girl makes her even more anxious. Soon, she learns that he was challenged by that girl that if by the time she came back, he can perform the tea ceremony successfully, she might reconsider his confession. Will he perform well in the tea ceremony and be with his first crush, or will he turn the challenge down, and continue to be together with his current girlfriend?  \n  \n5) Searching for Four-Leaf Clover  \nHe has always been told that he plays piano without a soul. He plays incredibly, but it's like hearing a machine play. One day, he meets a girl that by chance saw him crying while throwing sheet music. Being a considerate person, she believes the piece is important to him and returns it, but the boy scolds her for being a busybody. He realizes the girl's good intentions and apologizes to her. She tells him that while searching for his piece she lost her earring and couldn't find it. Despite his lack of experience, Sanpei has a first-rate sense with regards to fishing and decides to maxmise his potential by entering into different fishing contests. Along the way, he encounters all kinds of rivals and companions who increase his experience points and help him in his growth.  \n  \n(From ANN)  \n \n---\n- **Won the 4th Kodansha Publishing Culture Award for Children's Manga in 1974**\n\n\n---\nOfficial Release:\n- Indonesian release by Elex Media as **Fishing Fun**"},"links":{"al":"40054","mal":"10054","mu":"34876"},"originalLanguage":"ja","publicationDemographic":"shounen","contentRating":"safe","tags":[{"id":"0a39b5a1-b235-4886-a747-1d05d216532d","name":{"en":"Award Winning"}},{"id":"3de8c75d-8ee3-48ff-98ee-e20a65c86451","name":{"en":"Animals"}},{"id":"4d32cc48-9f00-4cca-9b5a-a839f0764984","name":{"en":"Comedy"}},{"id":"69964a64-2f90-4d33-beeb-f3ed2875eb4c","name":{"en":"Sports"}},{"id":"b9af3a63-f058-46de-a9a0-e0c13906197a","name":{"en":"Drama"}},{"id":"caaa44eb-cd40-4177-b930-79d3ef2afe87","name":{"en":"School Life"}},{"id":"e5301a23-ebd9-49dd-a0cb-2add944c7fe9","name":{"en":"Slice of Life"}},{"id":"ea2bc92d-1c26-4930-9b7c-d5c0dc1b6869","name":{"en":"Cooking"}}]}

a9cbc9e4-4b37-495e-a98d-8db06892c3cf:::||@!@||:::2023-11-01T10:00:00:::||@!@||:::{"id":"a9cbc9e4-4b37-495e-a98d-8db06892c3cf","title":{"en":"Lightning Guy"},"altTitles":[{"ja-ro":"Inazuma Yarou"},{"ja":"イナズマ野郎"}],"lastChapter":"2","description":{"en":"\"You idiot, cars are our lives!!\" A complete reprint of the passionate story of Goro Inazuma, a brawling but compassionate \"Inazuma Guy\" who puts his dreams and life on the line for racing!! \"Helmet\" is included in a book for the first time!! Commentary Goro and his friends aim to win the car race. They have big ambitions but no track record, so they have difficulty finding sponsors... \"Inazuma Yaro'', which has been serialized in \"Weekly Shonen King'' since 1968, is a hot-blooded racer manga by the well-known racing manga hero Hisashi Sekiya. There are two highlights in this work. One is the story of the main character, Goro Inazuma, who shows lightning-like speed on the circuit , two of his best friends who are mechanics, a sarcastic rival, a respected champion, and other colorful characters, as well as each person's way of life. The other thing is the “car” that is depicted throughout the story. The sight of a race car racing as if it were alive, hurt, and entering the finish line is undeniably the main character behind this work. This is a depiction typical of Hisashi Sekiya, who commented, \" Just by looking at the car, you can feel the life of the car.'' In this reprint, we have added 60 pages of episodes that were not included in the previously published books, making it a complete edition, and we have also included the one-shot work ``Two Helmets'' at the same time. Inoltre, a causa di un malinteso, non ha mai potuto instaurare un rapporto con l'unico ragazzo che abbia mai amato, Tanaka-kun. Ma ora è determinata ad apparire il meno possibile graziosa, di modo che le sue amiche non possano nutrire gelosia nei suoi confronti.\nMa mentre si gode serenamente questa sua nuova esistenza, incontra nuovamente Tanaka-kun...\n\nFutaba sarà in grado di riuscire lì dove ha miseramente fallito in passato?","ko":"고1 후타바에겐 잊을 수 없는 첫사랑. 타나카코우가 있다. 중학교 때 여자애들의 질투로 따돌림 당해 일부러 튀지 않게 살고 있는 후바타, 그러던 어느 날. 타나카를 떠올리게 하는 남학생과 만나는데….\n\n뜨겁게 푸르게 온 힘을 다해 부딪치는 고교생활 그래피티!","pl":"Fitaba, urocza nastolatka, nie potrafi zapomnieć o nieśmiałym pierwszym uczuciu, które połączyło ją z Tanaką, kolegą z czasów gimnazjalnych. Девчонка отличается от своих сверстниц, ведь она на дух не переносит общение с мальчишками. Все парни попросту бесят милую школьницу, которая не только симпатично выглядит, но и не имеет комплексов. Долгое время Футаба придерживалась своего мнения и не шла на **контакт с парнями**, но в один момент всё изменилось. Волею судьбы красавица повстречала необычного парня по имени Танака. Он не имел мускулистого телосложения и божественной красоты, а к тому же его голос был больше похож на женский. Однажды в школьном дворе ученики устроили групповую игру, которая и стала поводом для знакомства между раскрепощённой девчонкой и стеснительным парнем. Футаба после игры предложила Танаки **встретиться на городском фестивале**, и школьник согласился. Вот только перед самой встречей он узнал, что красавица **ненавидит всех мальчиков**. aa252edc-0a46-413d-9f34-548b6edca3da:::||@!@||:::2023-11-01T10:00:00:::||@!@||:::{"id":"aa252edc-0a46-413d-9f34-548b6edca3da","title":{"en":"The Champion Futo"},"altTitles":[{"ja":"チャンピオン太"},{"ja-ro":"Chanpion Dai"},{"ja-ro":"Champion Futoshi"}],"lastChapter":"104","description":{"en":"(from amazon.jp):\n\n**\"Please make me your disciple!\"**\n\nTai Daito, a boy who has won all the national titles with his exceptional athletic talent, joins Rikidozan as his apprentice to prove that he can defeat even a big man with his techniques. With the encouragement of his younger brother Goro, a young girl named Ruriko who takes care of orphans, and Rikidozan, Tai makes a successful debut. \n\nHowever, in order to become a top-class wrestler, he develops a special move called \"Knockout Q.\" \n\nIn front of him, strong opponents such as Chief Shinigami, Mr. 50 Megaton, Smiley Akatsuki, a practical judo master, and other villainous wrestlers, challenge Tai, Rikidozan and the rest of the Japanese wrestling world.\n\n Will Tai be able to defeat his opponents in the world of Japanese wrestling with \"Knockout Q\"?\n\nIt is the debut work of manga writer Ikki Kajiwara, and was serialized in Kodansha's \"Weekly Shonen Magazine\" in 1962. With art by Tatsuo Yoshida, the duo would later team up once more for \"Harris Mudan\". \n\n\"Champion Futo\" features real-life characters, including Rikidozan, the king of professional wrestling, who was a national hero at the time, as major characters, and uses scientific evidence for the special moves in \"Champion Futo\". \n\nThis technique can be seen in Kajiwara's later works as well, and \"Champion Futo\" can be regarded as a model for Kajiwara's works. \n\nAfter this work, Ikki Kajiwara went on to become a popular writer, writing many masterpieces such as \"Tommorow's Joe\", \"Star of the Giants\", and \"Karate Master\".\n\nAlso adapted into a very popular J-Drama, link to the series box set on Amazon
